column4: Is there a good reason why a GLX app would refuse to run saying the GLX extension isn't enabled on the display when it's being loaded in xorg.conf? ... And when Tuxracer and  GL Screensavers run perfectly with acceleration? ...
jr: Know what would cause it? There's a line to load GLX in my config file and everything else is OK, I cna't explain it
I'm trying an SDL port of the app
but not holding out much hope for it
XLIB: Extension GLX missing on display 0:0
Keeps saying that
yet this doesn't :(
I compiled it with the proper xlibs and GLX libaries
what is giving you that error?
Darkplaces, a GL based Quake engine replacement
what video card?
ATI Radeon 9200 mobility.
did you install the ati drivers after you compiled it?
No.
Do I need to compile the ATi drivers?
no
what do you think I did wrong?
I have no idea.
ksysguard or hit ctrl-esc
you need to edit your xorg.conf
that doesn't always work either. Especially if your XP is ntfs
doesn't quake 3 have linux binaries?
